attributes.action: Introduce licensing and road tax for horses and riders to use the public highways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Horses are large, half a tonne animals that can be very dangerous if not controlled properly. On this basis I think a certain level of competence should be proven before anyone can ride them on public highways.  They can travel in excess of 30 mph. For this reason they should pay some amount of road tax just as any other self powered vehicle that can go over 14 mph.
